elements.title: JYP’s 2nd K-pop Band Xdinary Heroes Says Their Name Means ‘Anyone Can Become a Hero’
elements.contents: JYP Entertainment has launched a band with a unique name, Xdinary Heroes, aka XH. Xdinary Heroes is the second boy band introduced by JYP’s artist label STUDIO J following DAY6.

elements.title: ENHYPEN to Make Their Quick Comeback in January 2022

elements.title: ‘The Red Sleeve’ Ratings Break Into Double Digits as ‘Now, We Are Breaking Up’ Sees Slight Drop
elements.contents: According to Nielsen Korea, the December 3rd broadcast of The Red Sleeve recorded average nationwide viewership ratings of 10.7 percent, taking first place in its time slot across all channels.

elements.title: BTS Tops Nine Year-End Charts of Billboard
elements.contents: Billboard revealed yesterday on its official homepage its 2021 year-end charts. Dua Lipa’s “Levitating” took first on Billboard’s 200 Global Songs chart while Olivia Rodrigo leads Billboard’s Global 200 Artist.
